programme.title: Boys Over Flowers
programme.desc: A wicked rumor is spread on the Internet that a second-year student at Shinhwa High School is pregnant.

programme.title: Boys Over Flowers
programme.desc: Not too eager to watch Jan Di dancing with one of his best friends, Jun Pyo exits the ballroom and ends up taking out his frustrations by the poolside.

programme.title: Boys Over Flowers
programme.desc: Making a rash choice, Jan Di tells her mother she has to go somewhere and runs off, heading toward Namsan Tower.

programme.title: Boys Over Flowers
programme.desc: Jan Di's bike is set ablaze while she is attacked with water balloons and blasted with a fire extinguisher.

programme.title: Boys Over Flowers
programme.desc: A psychic foresees that Jan Di will be losing something significant.

programme.title: Boys Over Flowers
programme.desc: Jun Pyo intends to expel his best friend and Jan Di out of Shinhwa High School -- and out of F4.

programme.title: Boys Over Flowers
programme.desc: Jan Di dashes to the hospital after being informed that Jun Pyo had been in an accident.

programme.title: Boys Over Flowers
programme.desc: Yi-jung gets a frantic call from his mother threatening to commit suicide because of his father.

programme.title: Dancing Cat
programme.desc: A documentary chronicling the daily dramas of Korea's street cats through the eyes of a poet.

programme.title: Boys Over Flowers
programme.desc: Yi Jung's mother frantically calls him threatening to commit suicide.

programme.title: Boys Over Flowers
programme.desc: A note indicates that class has been moved to the science lab. The lab is unoccupied, but Jan Di waits, not realizing that the room is filling with fumes.

programme.title: Boys Over Flowers
programme.desc: Jan Di's father gets kidnapped by loan sharks, which inevitably forces Jan Di's mother to swallow her pride and plead for Madam Kang's help.

programme.title: Boys Over Flowers
programme.desc: The F4 guys have moved on to college while Jan Di has entered her senior year of high school. She has not heard from Jun Pyo since he left.

programme.title: Boys Over Flowers
programme.desc: Jan Di waits to hear the conclusions of F3's meeting with Jun-pyo, and can tell from their look that it was not good.

programme.title: Boys Over Flowers
programme.desc: After treating Jan Di in a cruel manner, Mr. Jung prepares everything so that Jun-Pyo can visit her in Seoul. Will he be able to go without Madam Kang finding out?

programme.title: Boys Over Flowers
programme.desc: Jan Di's family hears about Jun-pyo's engagement and asks her miserably if it's true.

programme.title: Boys Over Flowers
programme.desc: Ji-hoo can see how hurt Jan Di is by the kiss, and continues to follow her as she stumbles around in shock.

programme.title: Boys Over Flowers
programme.desc: Jun-pyo begins seeing Jae-Kyung in a new light, like he's seeing her for the first time as a potential friend -- or maybe a kindred spirit.

programme.title: Boys Over Flowers
programme.desc: Woo-bin tries to talk some sense into Yi-jung, who is determined to drink himself into a stupor.

programme.title: Boys Over Flowers
programme.desc: At home, Jun-hee reminisces about how her mother meddled in her life, in much the same way she's interfering in Jun-pyo's now.
